name: Sankyo Fever! Fever!
overview: First title of the Sankyo Fever series of video games of SANKYO, Co., Ltd. who is also a Japanese manufacturer of pachinko machines. Three Honke Sankyo Fever Jikki Simulation titles were released for the Super Famicom. Other Sankyo Fever titles were released for the PlayStation, Sega Saturn, and WonderSwan.
